heading: ABN AMRO adopts a future-focused approach to Gen AI development
paragraph: Working with Capgemini as its project partner, the bank transitions to Microsoft Copilot and launches a new Gen AI factory approach to become a personal bank in the digital age

heading: Global Bank accelerates digital transformation with cloud migration
paragraph: Capgemini supports a seamless migration to the cloud, enabling faster innovation and improved customer experience.

heading: Retail leader leverages AI for personalized shopping
paragraph: With Capgemini, the retailer uses AI to deliver tailored recommendations and boost sales conversion.

heading: Manufacturing giant drives efficiency with IoT solutions
paragraph: Capgemini implements IoT platforms to optimize operations and reduce downtime for a global manufacturer.

heading: Insurance company reimagines claims with automation
paragraph: Capgemini helps automate claims processing, reducing turnaround time and improving customer satisfaction.
